addNewToken(address).details: Use containsToken mapping to check if array already contains element or not.

params.newToken: Address of the new token to be added

params.amount: Amount of tokens to be approved.
params.collateralToken: Address of the token to be approved.
params.collateralWallet: Address of the collateral wallet that needs approval.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

addNewToken(address).notice: Adds new token to the tokens array if it is not part of the array yet.

approveCollateral(address,address,uint25.notice: Approves collateral wallet to transfer given amount of collateral.

userdoc.notice: Wallet for holding ERC20 tokens that can be transferred to collateral wallet.
